name: threejs-playground
description: A Three.js playground with AI-powered features

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:embedding"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../shader-playground && npm install && cd ../embedding-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:embedding && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend && cd backend && npm run test:coverage && cd ../shader-playground && npm run test:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:embedding
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:embedding -- --fix
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && npm run docker:prod
scripts.deploy:check: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run build:all
